summary: Adds a khajiit follower (marriage available) to the drunken huntsman.
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=3][color=#ffd966]~ old and unsupported mod ~ 

[/color]old and unsupported mod.

[color=#90ee90]Description[/color][/size][/center][center]----------------[/center]


This companion is an unp companion based,(she uses her unp body,underwear),and unique body textures,a mix between Nerevar22g's [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/23119]Khajiit leopard body texture[/url] and assidman's [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12144]Khajiit nude body texture[/url]

[color=lightgreen][size=2]Location:[/size][/color]Whiterun,at the DRUNKEN HUNTSMAN
[color=lightgreen][size=2]Stats:[/size][/color]Vanilla,she's not an overpowered companion.
[color=lightgreen][size=2]Name:[/size][/color]Ja'Sharia,also called Sharia.
[color=lightgreen][size=2]Fighting:[/size][/color]Berserker(Jenassa based)
[color=lightgreen][size=2]Voice:[/size][/color]I can't use khajiit female voice,so i used Lydia's voice(femaleeventoned)

[center][color=lightgreen][size=3]Required mods[/size][/color][/center][center]----------------[/center]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168]ApachiiSkyHair[/url]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/5941]CoverKhajiit[/url]
To look like ion pictures you absolutely need this,althoug it's NOT REQUIRED TO WORK.
You should really use this mod!

[center][color=lightgreen][size=3]Recommended mods[/size][/color][/center][center]----------------[/center]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/5941]CoverKhajiit[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21967]Akiro Undone ENB[/url]
Mods used in screenshots:
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/9782]Moonpath to Elsweyr[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/20415]BrokeFoot unp armors[/url]

[center][color=lightgreen][size=3]Credits[/size][/color][/center][center]----------------[/center]

dimon99 for [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6709]dimonized unp body[/url]
Nerevar22g for [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/23119]Khajiit leopard body texture[/url]
assidman for [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12144]Khajiit nude body texture[/url]
Aachii for the wonderful [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168]Hiars[/url]
author: zzjay
